text: Broadwater County is a county in the U.S. state of Montana. As of the 2020 United States Census, there were 6,774 people. Its county seat is Townsend. The county was named for Charles Arthur Broadwater, a noted Montana railroad, real estate, and banking magnate. == References == Category:1890s establishments in Montana Category:1897 establishments in the United States Category:Montana counties
title: Broadwater County, Montana
